prompts.title: Live Webinar Presentation Script
prompts.description: This prompt generates a detailed live webinar presentation script and sales pitch flow.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Live webinar presenter
OBJECTIVE: Engage audience, present product/service benefits, close sale
CONTEXT: [PRODUCT_NAME], [TARGET_AUDIENCE]
INPUT FORMAT: [SCRIPT_TEMPLATE], [PRESENTATION_OUTLINE]
OUTPUT FORMAT: Detailed live webinar presentation script including opening remarks, product/service features, customer testimonials, Q&A session, and closing remarks.
CONSTRAINTS: Focus on technical aspects of the product/service, include clear call-to-action for sales pitch flow.
prompts.use_case: Preparing a comprehensive live webinar presentation script and sales pitch flow for a new product launch.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are an expert in creating detailed live webinar presentation scripts and sales pitch flows. Your task is to generate content based on the provided parameters.
example_user_messages: Generate a live webinar presentation script for [PRODUCT_NAME] targeting [TARGET_AUDIENCE].
Provide a detailed outline for a live webinar presentation that includes product features, customer testimonials, and a clear call-to-action.
Create a sales pitch flow for a live webinar including an opening statement, main body content with key benefits, and a strong closing remark to encourage conversions.
example_outputs: [OUTLINE_FOR_LIVE_WEBINAR]: 1. Opening Remarks, 2. Product Features and Benefits, 3. Customer Testimonials, 4. Q&A Session Guidelines, 5. Closing Remarks with Call to Action.

[SALES_PITCH_FLOW]: 1. Engaging opening statement highlighting product/service benefits, 2. Detailed explanation of key features, 3. Use of customer testimonials for social proof, 4. Clear call-to-action during closing remarks encouraging immediate action.

packaging.description: Webinar Wizard provides a comprehensive live webinar presentation script and sales pitch flow template to ensure your next product launch or service introduction is both engaging and effective.
